title: May Queen
resume: May Queen is a 2012 South Korean television melodrama series about three people who experience ambition, revenge, betrayal and love, against the backdrop of the shipbuilding industry in Ulsan during Korea's modernization. It stars Han Ji-hye, Kim Jae-won and Jae Hee.
